text: 2.7 Lom 16.25-26, Epe 3.5, 3.9, Kol 1.26, 2 Ti 1.9 Gos teplep yɨbɨl chɨn agñɨbun ak, God gos ne ak we gɨl yolɨgup. Bɨlel bɨlel God man ma alwol gɨlak ñɨn ak, gos ne ke nɨŋɨd chɨnop aglak. Aglɨl agak, Kɨli yad ayɨp mɨdɨl, mɨdtep gɨnɨgel agak. Pen bɨlel nɨb mɨd dad apɨl, gos teplep yɨbɨl anɨb ak we gɨl yek, chɨn mɨdupsek ma nɨgolɨgɨpun.
